Everyday.name: War Time!
Everyday.description: Join your faction for coordinated PvP battles!

Sunday.name: Double Scrap Post
Sunday.description: Loot bonus from scrap posts today!

Monday.name: 100% Harvest Vault Experience & Chest Rewards
Monday.description: Double experience and better loot from Harvest Vaults!

Tuesday.name: Exergy Event
Tuesday.description: This is your opportunity to catch up! With the right group, you should average 200-250k~ exergy per event time.

Thursday.name: Radiation Storm
Thursday.description: No fucking clue what this means.

Friday.name: Faction Contribution from PVP (25%)
Friday.description: Increased faction points from PvP activities!

Saturday.name: Protein Event
Saturday.description: Increased protein drops from all sources! Find the golden protein on the map!
